mapper.select: SELECT l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, u.username, p.img FROM tb_lecture l JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id JOIN tb_lecture_photo p ON p.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.state = 1 AND p.is_thumbnail = 1;

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, u.username, (SELECT img FROM tb_lecture_photo WHERE is_thumbnail=1 AND lecture_id= l.lecture_id) as img FROM tb_lecture l JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.state = 1 ORDER BY l.created_at DESC
AND REPLACE(l.title, ' ', '') LIKE '%${title}%'
AND c.category_name = #{categoryName}
AND l.price >= #{minPrice}
AND #{maxPrice} >= l.price
AND address LIKE '${location}%'
LIMIT #{startNum},12

SELECT lecture_id, title, category_name, price, address, username, (SELECT img FROM tb_lecture_photo WHERE is_thumbnail=1 AND lecture_id= a.lecture_id) as img FROM ( SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, u.username , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY l.created_at DESC) AS order_number FROM tb_lecture l JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id ) AS a WHERE order_number <= 10;

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, u.username FROM tb_lecture l JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.state = 1 AND (l.latitude > #{qa} AND l.latitude < #{pa} ) AND (l.longitude > #{ha} AND l.longitude < #{oa} )

SELECT lecture_id, latitude, longitude FROM ( SELECT lecture_id, latitude, longitude , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY lecture_id DESC) AS order_number FROM tb_lecture WHERE state = 1 ) AS a WHERE order_number = 1;
